mapper.insert: insert into REVIEWS (GROUP_ID, PLACE_ID, USER_ID, VISIT_DATE, TITLE, CONTENT, MEDIA) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{placeId}, #{userId}, #{visitDate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{media})
mapper.select: select R.REVIEW_ID, R.GROUP_ID, R.PLACE_ID, R.VISIT_DATE, R.MEDIA, R.TITLE, R.USER_ID, U.NAME, (SELECT GG.NAME FROM `GROUPS` GG where R.GROUP_ID = GG.GROUP_ID) as "groupName" from REVIEWS R inner join USERS U on R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where PLACE_ID = #{placeId} AND GROUP_ID IN ( SELECT G.GROUP_ID from GROUP_MEMBERS G where G.USER_ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY REVIEW_ID DESC;
select R.*, U.NAME, (SELECT GG.NAME FROM `GROUPS` GG where R.GROUP_ID = GG.GROUP_ID) as "groupName" from REVIEWS R inner join USERS U on R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
